trans-unit.source: Provides user interface (UI) elements for logging in to a Web site.
trans-unit.target: 提供用户界面 (UI) 元素以便登录到网站。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Style and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [Validation Groupings](#validation_groupings) - [Accessibility](#accessibility) - [Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The Login control is a composite control that provides all the common UI elements needed to authenticate a user on a Web site.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中:-[简介](#introduction) - [样式和模板](#styles_and_templates) - [验证分组](#validation_groupings) - [可访问性](#accessibility) - [应用 CSS 样式](#applying_styles) - [声明性语法](#declarative_syntax) # # 简介登录控件是提供对 Web 站点上的用户进行身份验证所需所有常见 UI 元素的复合控件。

trans-unit.source: The following three elements are required for all login scenarios: - A unique user name to identify the user.
trans-unit.target: 以下三个元素所需的所有登录方案:-用于标识用户的唯一用户名。

trans-unit.source: - A password to verify the identity of the user.
trans-unit.target: 的若要验证的用户标识密码。

trans-unit.source: - A login button to send the login information to the server.
trans-unit.target: -A 登录按钮以向服务器发送的登录信息。

trans-unit.source: The Login control also provides the following optional UI elements that support additional functions: - A link for a password reminder.
trans-unit.target: 登录控件还提供了以下可选 UI 元素，以便支持其他函数:-密码提示的链接。

trans-unit.source: - A Remember Me checkbox for retaining the login information between sessions.
trans-unit.target: -A 记住我复选框保留会话之间的登录信息。

trans-unit.source: - A Help link for users who are having trouble logging in.
trans-unit.target: 的用户登录时出现问题帮助链接。

trans-unit.source: - A Register New User link that redirects users to a registration page.
trans-unit.target: -A 注册新用户的链接将用户重定向到的注册页。

trans-unit.source: - Instruction text that appears on the login form.
trans-unit.target: 指令登录窗体显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: - Custom error text that appears when the user clicks the login button without filling in the user name or password fields.
trans-unit.target: 的当用户而不填充用户名称或密码字段中单击登录按钮时显示自定义错误文本。

trans-unit.source: - Custom error text that appears if the login fails.
trans-unit.target: -显示如果登录失败达到的自定义错误文本。

trans-unit.source: - A custom action that occurs when login succeeds.
trans-unit.target: 的登录成功时发生自定义操作。

trans-unit.source: - A way to hide the login control if the user is already logged in to the site.
trans-unit.target: 的如果用户已登录到站点，则隐藏 login 控件一种方法。

trans-unit.source: For a table showing which controls are required and which are optional, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 显示哪些控件为必选和可选的表，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果你不熟悉的 ASP.NET 提供的登录控件集，请参阅[ASP.NET 登录控件概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)才能继续。

trans-unit.source: For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Accepting user input is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 接受用户输入是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords.
trans-unit.target: 恶意用户可以发送数据，用于公开的漏洞或运行程序会尝试生成的密码。

trans-unit.source: To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control.
trans-unit.target: 为了提高安全性，处理用户输入时，应使用的控件的验证功能和安全配置的任何数据提供程序为您的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Securing Membership](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)， [Web 应用程序的基本安全实践](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[保护成员资格](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The Login control uses a membership provider to obtain user credentials.
trans-unit.target: 登录控件使用成员资格提供程序获取用户凭据。

trans-unit.source: Unless you specify otherwise, the Login control uses the default membership provider defined in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 除非另行指定，否则，Login 控件使用 Web.config 文件中定义默认成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: To specify a different provider, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.MembershipProvider%2A> property to one of the membership provider names defined in your application's Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定不同的提供程序，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.MembershipProvider%2A>到其中一个成员资格提供程序名称的属性在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中定义。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Membership Providers](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[成员资格提供程序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use a custom authentication service, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnAuthenticate%2A> method to call the service.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用自定义身份验证服务，则可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnAuthenticate%2A>方法来调用服务。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnAuthenticate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Styles and Templates The appearance of the Login control is fully customizable through templates and style settings.
trans-unit.target: # # 样式和模板是通过模板和样式设置完全可自定义登录控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: All UI text messages are also customizable through properties of the Login class.
trans-unit.target: 所有 UI 文本消息也都是通过登录类的属性可自定义的。

trans-unit.source: The default interface text is automatically localized based on the locale setting on the server.
trans-unit.target: 默认接口文本自动进行了本地化基于服务器上的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: If the Login control is customized with templates, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用模板时，自定义登录控件则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>属性将被忽略。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property of each template child control directly.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>直接每个模板子控件的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Login control properties represented by text boxes, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Password%2A>, are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 表示文本框中，如登录控件属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Password%2A>，页生命周期的所有阶段都可访问。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Password%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged> event triggered by the textboxes.
trans-unit.target: 控件将选取由最终用户的方式进行任何更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>由文本框触发的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you embed the Login control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> object, explicitly set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> property in a `Page_Load` event handler if the user is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果您嵌入中的登录控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep>对象，显式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>中的属性`Page_Load`事件处理程序当用户进行身份验证。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control does not automatically advance to the next <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> object in this scenario.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件没有自动前进到下一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep>在此方案中的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the Login control style properties and explains which UI element each style property affects.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的登录控件样式属性并说明每个样式属性会影响哪些用户界面元素。

trans-unit.source: For a list of which properties each style applies to, see the documentation for the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 有关哪些属性的每个样式应用到的列表，请参阅的单个样式属性的文档。

trans-unit.source: |Style property|UI element affected| |--------------------|-------------------------| ||The space between the control contents and the control's border.| ||Remember Me checkbox.| ||Login failure text.| ||Instructional text on the page that tells users how to use the control.| ||Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| ||Text entry input fields.| ||Title text.| ||Text displayed to the user when a login attempt is unsuccessful due to validation errors.| ||Links to other pages.| ||Login button.| ## Validation Groupings The and properties have controls associated with them to prevent users from submitting the page without providing required information.
trans-unit.target: |样式属性 |受影响的用户界面元素 | |--------------------|-------------------------| ||控件内容和控件的边框之间的空间。 | ||记住我复选框。 | ||登录失败文本。 | ||告知用户如何使用控件的页面上的说明文本。 | ||标签的所有输入字段，例如文本框。 | ||文本输入输入字段。 | ||标题文本。 | ||由于验证错误而失败的登录尝试时向用户显示的文本。 | ||链接至其他页面。 | ||登录按钮。 | # # 验证分组和属性具有与它们可以阻止用户且不提供所需的信息提交页面相关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: The Login control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the Login control can be validated separately.
trans-unit.target: 登录控件使用的验证组，以便可以单独验证与登录控件相同的页上的其他字段。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the Login control is used as the name of the validation group.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>登录控件的属性用作验证组的名称。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, a Login control with the ID "Login1" will use a validation group name of "Login1".
trans-unit.target: 例如，具有 ID"Login1"的登录控件将使用"Login1"的验证组名称。

trans-unit.source: If you want to set the validation group that the Login control is part of, you must template the control and change the validation group name.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要设置的验证组中 Login 控件是的一部分，你必须将控件模板和更改的验证组名称。

trans-unit.source: ## Applying CSS Styles The Login control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup.
trans-unit.target: # # 应用 CSS 样式登录控制允许您指定在标记中的 CSS 样式规则。

trans-unit.source: If you use templates to customize the appearance of the Login control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates.
trans-unit.target: 如果模板用于自定义登录控件的外观，你可以在模板中的标记中指定 CSS 样式。

trans-unit.source: In that case, no extra outer table is required.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，没有额外的外部表是必需的。

trans-unit.source: You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RenderOuterTable%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以防止通过设置呈现表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RenderOuterTable%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RenderOuterTable%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记辅助功能的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> constructor creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control that can be programmatically inserted into a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>构造函数创建的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>可以以编程方式插入到网页上的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>的新实例的初始属性值

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 当用户进行身份验证时发生。

trans-unit.source: The Authenticate event is raised when a user uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control to log in to a Web site.
trans-unit.target: 当用户使用时引发进行身份验证事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件以要求在登录到网站。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: Custom authentication schemes can use the Authenticate event to authenticate users.
trans-unit.target: 自定义身份验证方案可以使用身份验证事件用户进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When a user uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control to log in to a Web site, all data in the view state and all post data is lost.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 当用户使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件中登录到网站时中的视图状态的所有数据和所有 post 数据将丢失。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: Do not perform actions in the Authenticate event that rely on the view state.
trans-unit.target: 不依赖于的视图状态进行身份验证事件中执行操作。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of padding inside the borders of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的边框内的填充量<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The value of the BorderPadding property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 属性是 BorderPadding 的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> control and the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> control's border.
trans-unit.target: （以像素为单位） 的内容之间的空间量<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>控件和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>控件的边框。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_1" name="1" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_1" name="1" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The BorderPadding property is set to a value less than -1.
trans-unit.target: BorderPadding 属性设置为小于-1 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object that defines the settings for the Remember Me check box.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>对象，用于定义的设置记住我复选框。

trans-unit.source: The CheckBoxStyle property gets a reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that you use to change the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control's Remember Me check box.
trans-unit.target: CheckBoxStyle 属性获取的引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象，供你用来更改的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件的记住我复选框。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CheckBoxStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `CheckBoxStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CheckBoxStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CheckBoxStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The CheckBoxStyle property defines the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: CheckBoxStyle 属性定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeText%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the CheckBoxStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 与的样式设置合并 CheckBoxStyle 属性的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the CheckBoxStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: CheckBoxStyle 属性中所做的任何设置重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control style properties are overridden by CheckBoxStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, the CheckBoxStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件样式属性被 CheckBoxStyle 设置覆盖:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A>当你使用模板定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件，CheckBoxStyle 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that defines the style settings for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> control's Remember Me check box.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> ，它定义的样式设置<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>控件的记住我复选框。

trans-unit.source: Creates the individual controls that make up the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> control and associates event handlers with their events.
trans-unit.target: 创建构成单个控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>使用其事件的控件并将关联事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The CreateChildControls method creates instances of the controls that compose the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: CreateChildControls 方法创建的控件的撰写实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of an image to display next to the link to a registration page for new users.
trans-unit.target: 获取要显示旁边为新用户的注册页的链接的图像的位置。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image to display.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of a link to a registration page for new users.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置到注册页的链接文本新用户。

trans-unit.source: The CreateUserText property contains the text of a link to the registration page for the site.
trans-unit.target: CreateUserText 属性包含指向站点的注册页的文本。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the registration page is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 注册页的 URL 中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A> is empty, the text in the CreateUserText property is displayed to the user, but is not formatted as a link.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A>为空的 CreateUserText 属性显示给用户，但未格式化的链接的形式中的文本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the CreateUserText property is empty, a link to the registration page is not available to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CreateUserText 属性为空，不是可供用户注册页的链接。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text of the link to the new-user registration page.
trans-unit.target: 新用户注册页的链接的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the new-user registration page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置新用户注册页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The CreateUserUrl property contains the URL of the new-user registration page for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: CreateUserUrl 属性包含网站的新用户注册页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A> property contains the text used for the link.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A>属性包含用于链接的文本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A> property is empty, the link to the registration page is unavailable to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A>属性为空，则在注册页的链接才对用户不可用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the new-user registration page.
trans-unit.target: 新用户注册页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the page displayed to the user when a login attempt is successful.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置成功的登录尝试时向用户显示的页面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The DestinationPageUrl property specifies the page that is displayed when a login attempt is successful.
trans-unit.target: DestinationPageUrl 属性指定当登录尝试不成功时显示的页。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is to return the user to the referring page, or to the page defined in the `defaultUrl` attribute of the element in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 默认行为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制是将用户返回到引用的页中，或中定义的页`defaultUrl`的 Web.config 文件中的元素的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The DestinationPageUrl property overrides the default behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, as well as the `defaultUrl` setting made in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: DestinationPageUrl 属性重写的默认行为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件，以及`defaultUrl`所做的配置文件中的设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the page the user is redirected to when a login attempt is successful.
trans-unit.target: 页面的 URL 用户时重定向到登录尝试不成功。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display a check box to enable the user to control whether a persistent cookie is sent to their browser.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示一个复选框以使用户能够控制是否持久性 cookie 发送到其浏览器。

trans-unit.source: When the DisplayRememberMe property is set to `true`, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeText%2A> property is displayed on the page, along with a Remember Me check box.
trans-unit.target: 当 DisplayRememberMe 属性设置为`true`中, 包含的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeText%2A>页面上显示属性，以及记住我复选框。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeText%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user selects the Remember Me check box, the authentication cookie sent to his or her computer persists so that the user is automatically authenticated on future visits to the site.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择记住我复选框，发送到他或她的计算机的身份验证 cookie 仍然存在，以便将来访问站点上自动验证用户。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A> property is set by the selection in the Remember Me check box.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A>属性由设置所选内容中记住我复选框。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: If DisplayRememberMe is `false`, a Remember Me check box is not displayed on the page and the user has no way to control whether the authentication cookie persists or not.
trans-unit.target: 如果 DisplayRememberMe `false`、 记住我复选框不会显示在页面和用户是否身份验证 cookie 仍然存在或不具有不能控制。

trans-unit.source: You can still set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A> property to `true` to send a persistent authentication cookie to the user's browser without displaying the check box.
trans-unit.target: 您仍可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A>属性`true`发送到用户的浏览器的持久性身份验证 cookie，而不显示复选框。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There are inherent security risks with setting a persistent authentication cookie on a user's browser.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 有与在用户的浏览器上设置持久性身份验证 cookie 的固有安全风险。

trans-unit.source: You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site.
trans-unit.target: 你应该确定是否可以接受你的站点的这些安全风险。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A> property to `true` and the DisplayRememberMe property to `false`, users visiting your Web site from public browsers, as in Internet cafes for example, can accidentally leave persistent authentication cookies behind and the next user of the browser will be able to access your Web site using the previous user's credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A>属性`true`而 DisplayRememberMe 属性设为`false`、 访问您的网站从公共的浏览器的用户，如下所示 Internet 吧例如，可以无意中将留在后面的持久性身份验证 cookie 和浏览器的下一个用户将能够访问您的网站以使用以前用户的凭据。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display the check box; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要显示复选框，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the action that occurs when a login attempt fails.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当登录尝试失败时发生的操作。

trans-unit.source: The FailureAction property defines the behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control when the user does not successfully log in to the Web site.
trans-unit.target: FailureAction 属性定义的行为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制当用户没有成功登录到网站。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior reloads the page and displays the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A> property to alert the user that the login attempt failed.
trans-unit.target: 默认行为重新加载页面，并显示的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A>属性来提醒用户的登录尝试失败。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A>

trans-unit.source: When FailureAction is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction>, the user is redirected to the login page defined in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 当 FailureAction 设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction>，用户定向到 Web.config 文件中定义的登录页。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The selected value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 所选的值不是之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed when a login attempt fails.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示的登录尝试失败时的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text to display to the user when a login attempt fails.
trans-unit.target: 要登录尝试失败时，向用户显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Your login attempt has failed.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"您的登录尝试失败。

trans-unit.source: Please try again."
trans-unit.target: 请重试。"

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of error text in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个定义中的错误文本的外观的属性集合的引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The FailureTextStyle property gets a reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that you use to change the appearance of login failure text.
trans-unit.target: FailureTextStyle 属性获取的引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象，供你用来更改登录失败文本的外观。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The default is to display the text in red.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是以红色显示文本。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>类 (例如， `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The FailureTextStyle property defines the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: FailureTextStyle 属性定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the FailureTextStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 与的样式设置合并 FailureTextStyle 属性的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the FailureTextStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.

trans-unit.target: 若要显示的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of a link to the login Help page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置到登录帮助页的链接的文本。

trans-unit.source: The HelpPageText property contains the link text to the login Help page for the site.
trans-unit.target: HelpPageText 属性包含到站点的登录名的帮助页的链接文本。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the login Help page is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 登录帮助页的 URL 中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A> is empty, the text in the HelpPageText property is displayed to the user on the page, but is not formatted as a link.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A>为空的 HelpPageText 向在页上，用户显示的属性，但未格式化的链接的形式中的文本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the HelpPageText property is empty, the link to the login Help page is not available to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果 HelpPageText 属性为空，不是可供用户登录帮助页的链接。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the LabelStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: LabelStyle 属性中所做的任何设置重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> style properties are overridden by LabelStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, the LabelStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>样式属性被 LabelStyle 设置覆盖:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A>当你使用模板定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件，LabelStyle 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to display the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用来显示模板<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The LayoutTemplate property contains the template that defines how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: LayoutTemplate 属性包含模板，它定义如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>向用户显示控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the required and optional controls used in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control template.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了使用中的必选和可选控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件模板。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: |ID or command name|Control type|Required/optional| |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`UserName`|Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, or a custom or third-party control.|Required| |`Password`|Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, or a custom or third-party control.|Required| |`RememberMe`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>|Optional| |`FailureText`|Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl>.|Optional| |`Login`|Any control that causes event bubbling.|Optional| The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control throws an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception if the layout template does not contain the required controls.
trans-unit.target: | ID 或命令名称 |控件类型 |必需/可选 | |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`UserName`|实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，任何控件包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自定义或第三方控件。 |所需 | |`Password`|实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，任何控件包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自定义或第三方控件。 |所需 | |`RememberMe`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>|可选 | |`FailureText`|实现<xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl>任何控件。 |可选 | |`Login`|导致事件冒泡任何控件。 |可选 | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件将引发<xref:System.Web.HttpException>异常如果布局模板不包含所需的控件。</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown if you give an optional control ID to a control of the wrong type; however, the control is subsequently ignored by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 在可选控件 ID 赋予错误类型; 的控件不引发任何异常但是，该控件随后将被忽略<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The login control can be any control that causes event bubbling, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>.
trans-unit.target: 登录控件均可以是导致事件上传方法，如任何控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The control's command name property must be set to "Login".
trans-unit.target: 控件的命令名称属性必须设置为"登录"。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous request that was saved with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState*> method.
trans-unit.target: 从已保存的上一个请求还原视图状态信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState*>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the control state to restore.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示要还原的控件状态的对象。

trans-unit.source: savedState is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: savedState不是有效。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user logs in to the Web site and has been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在登录到网站并已经过身份验证时发生。

trans-unit.source: The LoggedIn event is raised after the authentication provider checks the user's credentials and the authentication cookie is queued to send to the browser in the next response.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证提供程序将检查用户的凭据和身份验证 cookie 排队等待发送到下一步的响应中的浏览器后，将引发 LoggedIn 事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the LoggedIn event to provide additional processing, such as accessing per-user data, after the user is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 使用 LoggedIn 事件提供额外的处理，例如用户进行身份验证之后访问每个用户数据。

trans-unit.source: When a user submits his or her login information, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control first raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event, and finally the LoggedIn event.
trans-unit.target: 当用户提交他或她登录信息，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件首先引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>事件，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate>事件，并最后 LoggedIn 事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When a user uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control to log in to a Web site, all data in the view state and all post data is lost.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 当用户使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件中登录到网站时中的视图状态的所有数据和所有 post 数据将丢失。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: Do not perform actions in the LoggedIn event that rely on the view state.
trans-unit.target: 不依赖于的视图状态 LoggedIn 事件中执行操作。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user submits login information, before authentication takes place.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在身份验证发生之前提交登录信息时发生。

trans-unit.source: The LoggingIn event is raised when a user submits login information but before the user is authenticated on the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 当用户提交登录信息，但在用户进行身份验证网站上之前，将引发当前登录事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the LoggingIn event to set up any information that you need before authenticating a user.
trans-unit.target: 使用当前登录事件设置对用户进行身份验证之前，你需要的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel a login attempt during the LoggingIn event by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置在当前登录事件期间取消登录尝试<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the LoggingIn event is raised, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event and then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发当前登录事件后，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件都将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate>事件，然后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Represents the command name associated with the login button.
trans-unit.target: 表示与登录按钮相关联的命令名称。

trans-unit.source: LoginButtonCommandName is a read-only field and the default value is "Login".
trans-unit.target: LoginButtonCommandName 为只读字段，默认值为"登录"。

trans-unit.source: This value is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnBubbleEvent%2A>, and if the value is "Login", the control attempts to log in the current user.
trans-unit.target: 此值传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnBubbleEvent%2A>，如果值为"登录"，尝试登录当前的用户控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnBubbleEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image to use for the login button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要使用的登录按钮图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The LoginButtonImageUrl property contains the URL of the image rendered as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control login button when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>.
trans-unit.target: LoginButtonImageUrl 属性包含呈现为图像的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件登录按钮时的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A> property is used as the alternative text for the image in browsers that do not display images.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A>属性用作中不显示图像的浏览器的图像的替换文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image used for the login button.
trans-unit.target: 用于登录按钮的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the login button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>对象，它允许你设置中的登录按钮的外观<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the LoginButtonStyle property to control the appearance of the login button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 LoginButtonStyle 属性来控制中的登录按钮的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `LoginButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `LoginButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `LoginButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `LoginButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The LoginButtonStyle property defines the appearance of the login button.
trans-unit.target: LoginButtonStyle 属性定义的登录按钮的外观。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the LoginButtonStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 与的样式设置合并 LoginButtonStyle 属性的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the LoginButtonStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: LoginButtonStyle 属性中所做的任何设置重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> style properties are overridden by LoginButtonStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, the LoginButtonStyle property has no effect.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> control's login button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的文本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>控件的登录按钮。

trans-unit.source: The LoginButtonText property contains the text displayed for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control's login button.
trans-unit.target: LoginButtonText 属性包含为显示的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件的登录按钮。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A> property, the LoginButtonText property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link.
trans-unit.target: 根据值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A>属性，LoginButtonText 属性可以显示为上一个按钮的文本显示在浏览器中不呈现图像，图像的替代项为或链接的文本的文本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how the different <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A> values affect the LoginButtonText property.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述了如何不同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A>值会影响 LoginButtonText 属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A> setting|How the LoginButtonText property is used.| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|As the button's `Text` property.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|As alternative text for the image.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|As link text.| The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A>设置 |如何使用 LoginButtonText 属性。 | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|为按钮的`Text`属性。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|为映像的可选文本。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|作为链接文本。 | 默认文本控件已本地化根据服务器的当前区域设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: The text used for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> control's login button.

trans-unit.target: 默认值为"登录"。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button to use when rendering the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> button.

trans-unit.source: The LoginButtonType property determines the type of button to use for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control's login button.

trans-unit.source: |LoginButtonType setting|Type of button rendered| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|An HTML button with the text specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A> property.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|An image.
trans-unit.target: |LoginButtonType 设置 |呈现的按钮类型 | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A>属性中指定的文本 HTML 按钮。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|映像。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的图像的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonImageUrl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The string specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A> property is used as alternate text for the image.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|An HTML link with the text specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A> property.| When the LoginButtonType property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>, the content of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonImageUrl%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A>属性中指定的字符串用作映像替换文字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|一条带有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A>属性中指定的文本的 HTML 链接。 | 当 LoginButtonType 属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>，则内容的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonImageUrl%2A>属性将被忽略。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonText%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> enumeration values.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a login error is detected.
trans-unit.target: 当检测到登录名错误时发生。

trans-unit.source: The LoginError event is raised when the credentials entered by the user are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 用户输入的凭据无效时，将引发 LoginError 事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the LoginError event to redirect the user to a custom error page, to offer additional help, or to log failed login attempts.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 LoginError 事件将用户重定向到自定义错误页，以提供更多帮助，或登录失败的登录尝试次数。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the membership data provider used by the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该控件使用的成员身份数据提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The MembershipProvider property contains the name of the data provider that provides the authentication information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: MembershipProvider 属性包含的数据提供程序提供的身份验证信息的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: Valid membership provider names are defined in the `<membership>` element in your application's Machine.config or Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 在中定义有效的成员资格提供程序名称`<membership>`应用程序的 Machine.config 或 Web.config 文件中的元素。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the MembershipProvider property, it will always return <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 MembershipProvider 属性，它将始终返回<xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>类。</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>

trans-unit.source: If the current event is posted by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control Login button, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control attempts to log in to the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前事件发布<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制登录按钮，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件尝试登录到网站。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to send a persistent authentication cookie to the user's browser.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将持久性身份验证 cookie 发送到用户的浏览器。

trans-unit.source: When the RememberMeSet property is `true`, the authentication cookie sent to the user's computer is set to expire in 50 years, making it a persistent cookie that will be used when the user next visits the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 当 RememberMeSet 属性是`true`，发送到用户的计算机的身份验证 cookie 已设置为过期 50 在年中，因而当用户下一步访问网站时将使用持久性 cookie。

trans-unit.source: Because the authentication cookie will be present on the user's computer, the user will be considered already authenticated and will not have to log in to the Web site again.
trans-unit.target: 由于身份验证 cookie 将存在于用户的计算机上，用户将被视为已通过身份验证，并不会再次登录到网站。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A> property is `true`, the RememberMeSet property is set to the value of the check box displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A>属性是`true`，RememberMeSet 属性设置为向用户显示复选框的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A> property is `false`, a Remember Me check box is not displayed on the page and the user has no way to control whether the authentication cookie is persistent.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A>属性是`false`、 记住我复选框不会显示在页面和用户具有不能控制是否是持久性的身份验证 cookie。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the RememberMeSet property is `true`, the authentication cookie sent to the user's browser will be a persistent cookie.
trans-unit.target: 如果 RememberMeSet 属性为`true`，发送到用户的浏览器的身份验证 cookie 将持久性 cookie。

trans-unit.source: If the user logs out of the Web site using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control, the persistent cookie is cleared from the user's computer and the user will have to log in to the site on the next visit.
trans-unit.target: 如果在用户登录网站利用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>控制，则持久性 cookie 清除从用户的计算机和用户将需要在下一步访问登录到站点。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There are inherent security risks with setting a persistent authentication cookie on a user's browser.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 有与在用户的浏览器上设置持久性身份验证 cookie 的固有安全风险。

trans-unit.source: You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site.
trans-unit.target: 你应该确定是否可以接受你的站点的这些安全风险。

trans-unit.source: If you set the RememberMeSet property to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A> property to `false`, users visiting your Web site from public browsers, as in Internet cafes for example, can accidentally leave persistent authentication cookies behind and the next user of the browser will be able to access your Web site using the previous user's credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 RememberMeSet 属性设为`true`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A>属性`false`、 访问您的网站从公共的浏览器的用户，如下所示 Internet 吧例如，可以无意中将留在后面的持久性身份验证 cookie 和浏览器的下一个用户将能够访问您的网站以使用以前用户的凭据。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to send a persistent authentication cookie; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要发送持久性身份验证 cookie;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control encloses rendered HTML in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""></xref> element in order to apply inline styles.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否包含在呈现的 HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""> </xref>才能将应用内联样式元素。

trans-unit.source: In order to make inline style properties such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> apply to all the HTML that is rendered for the control, ASP.NET encloses the rendered HTML in a `table` element.
trans-unit.target: 为了使内联样式属性，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>适用于所有控件呈现的 HTML，ASP.NET 将中呈现的 HTML`table`元素。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the outer `table` element to be rendered, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不希望外部`table`元素呈现，将此属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: In that case, if you try to set inline style properties that apply to the whole control, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，如果你尝试设置应用于整个控件的样式属性的内联，则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control encloses rendered HTML in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""></xref> element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件包含中呈现的 HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""> </xref>元素; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Saves any state that was modified after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*> method was invoked.
trans-unit.target: 将保存已修改后的任何状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*>调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the current view state of the control; otherwise, if there is no view state associated with the control, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件; 的当前视图状态的对象否则为如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`).

trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值。

trans-unit.source: |LoginTextLayout value|Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout>|Places labels to the left of the associated text entry fields.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout>|Places labels above the associated text entry fields.|

trans-unit.source: The default is "User Name:".
trans-unit.target: 默认值是"用户名称:"。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message to display in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"></xref> control when the user name field is left blank.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在中显示的错误消息<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"></xref>控制当将用户名字段留空。

trans-unit.source: The UserNameRequiredErrorMessage property contains the error message displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control on the login page.
trans-unit.target: UserNameRequiredErrorMessage 属性包含中显示的错误消息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>的登录页上的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: The UserNameRequiredErrorMessage property value is displayed only when both the following conditions are true: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control is present on the page.
trans-unit.target: 仅在满足以下条件时会显示 UserNameRequiredErrorMessage 属性值:-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>控件是在页上存在。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: - The User name text box is left blank by the user.
trans-unit.target: -用户名称文本框中是由用户保留为空。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本进行了本地化根据服务器的当前区域设置。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.PasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A> and UserNameRequiredErrorMessage values are wrapped in a validation group within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 同时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.PasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A>和 UserNameRequiredErrorMessage 值包装在中的验证组<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.PasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For these values to display, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ValidationGroup%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control must be set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示，这些值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ValidationGroup%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>控件必须设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ValidationGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message to display in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"></xref> control when the user name field is left blank.
trans-unit.target: 要在显示的错误消息<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"></xref>控制当将用户名字段留空。

trans-unit.source: The default is "User Name."
trans-unit.target: 默认值是"用户名称"。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> properties that define the appearance of error messages associated with validators used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对的集合的引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>定义错误消息的外观的属性与使用的验证程序<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the ValidatorTextStyle property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用于与 ValidatorTextStyle 属性的自定义项的样式设置。

trans-unit.source: |Setting|Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|The color behind the error messages.
The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.| |`BorderColor`|The color of the border around the error messages.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。 | |`BorderColor`|错误消息周围边框的颜色。</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.| |`BorderStyle`|The style of the border around the error messages.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。 | |`BorderStyle`|错误消息周围边框的样式。</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: The style can be "None", "Dotted", "Dashed", "Solid", "Double", "Groove", "Ridge", "Inset", or "Outset".
trans-unit.target: 该样式可以是"None"、"点"、"虚线"、"实体"、"Double"、"凹线"、"Ridge"、"嵌入"或"开始"。

trans-unit.source: The default is "NotSet".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"NotSet"。

trans-unit.source: Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|The width of the border around the error messages.| |`CssClass`|The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the error messages.
trans-unit.target: 某些样式不清楚地出现除非`BorderWidth`值是否大于 2。 | |`BorderWidth`|错误消息周围边框的宽度。 | |`CssClass`|用于呈现错误消息的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。

trans-unit.source: If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` to display the error message text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` to display the error message text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` to display the error message text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|The size of the text in the error messages as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` to display the error message text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` to display the error message text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|The color of the text in the error messages.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定其他设置，它们将替代的样式表设置。 | |`Font-Bold` | `true`以粗体类型显示错误消息文本。 | |`Font-Italic` | `true`以斜体显示的错误消息文本。 | |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。 | |`Font-Overline` | `true`以指示它上面的行在错误消息文本显示。 | |`Font-Size`|作为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>对象中的错误消息文本的大小。 | |`Font-Strikeout` | `true`为带删除线显示错误消息文本。 | |`Font-Underline` | `true`以显示错误消息文本中的带下划线。 | |`ForeColor`|中的错误消息的文本的颜色。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.| |`Height`|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> object that represents the height of the error messages.| |`Width`|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> object that represents the width of the error messages.|
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。 | |`Height`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>对象，表示的错误消息的高度。 | |`Width`|A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>对象，表示的错误消息的宽度。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> </xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> containing the style settings.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref>包含的样式设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> control after the user is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>后对用户进行身份验证进行控制。

trans-unit.source: The VisibleWhenLoggedIn property specifies whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is displayed to authenticated users.
trans-unit.target: VisibleWhenLoggedIn 属性指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>向经过身份验证的用户显示控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: When the property is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control does not appear on the page when an authenticated user accesses the site.
trans-unit.target: 当该属性是`false`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>当经过身份验证的用户访问站点时，控件不显示在页面上。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: This is used on Web pages that are used both as login pages and as information pages to hide the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control after the user has been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 用于登录页和信息页面隐藏的网页上使用此<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>后对用户已经过身份验证进行控制。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: The VisibleWhenLoggedIn property has no effect on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control that appears on the default login page defined in Web.config or in the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: VisibleWhenLoggedIn 属性不起任何作用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>在 Web.config 中或应用程序的配置文件中定义的默认登录页显示的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref> control should be hidden when the user is authenticated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login"></xref>时用户已经过身份验证; 否则为将隐藏控件<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
